{{#css: .AllianceTable {width:100%; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; background-color: #f9f9f9; text-align:left; border-radius: 10px; vertical-align:top; border-spacing:0px;} .AllianceTable th:nth-child(1) {width:10%; padding: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-radius: 10px 10px 0px 0px} .AllianceTable td:nth-child(1) {width:8rem; padding: 0px 0px 0px 10px;} .AllianceTable tr:nth-child(1) {text-shadow:1px 1px 1px gray; background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.5);} .AllianceTable tr:nth-child(1) th { padding: 5px; font-family: serif; font-size:72px; height:135px; word-wrap:break-word; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden;} .AllianceTable td:nth-child(odd) {font-weight:700;} #AllianceLeaders {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3); border: 0px;} #AllianceLeaders th {border: 0px; border-radius: 10px 10px 0px 0px} #AllianceRole {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3); border: 0px;} #AllianceAlignment {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px;} #AllianceAppable {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px;} #AllianceMembers {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3); border: 0px;} #AllianceDescription {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px; font-weight:normal; border-radius:0px 0px 10px 10px;} }}{| class="AllianceTable" ! colspan="4" | {{#if:{{{allianceimage|}}} | [[File:{{{allianceimage}}}|135x135px]] {{PAGENAME}}| {{PAGENAME}} }} |- | id="AllianceLeaders" | Leader: || id="AllianceLeaders" | {{#arraymap:{{{leaders|}}}|,|x|{{#set:AllianceLeaders=x}}[[x]]}} | id="AllianceRole" | Role: || id="AllianceRole" | {{{role}}} |- | id="AllianceAlignment" | Average Alignment: || id="AllianceAlignment" | {{#set:Alliancealignment={{{alignment|Undefined}}}}}[[{{{alignment}}}]] | id="AllianceAppable" | Appable: || id="AllianceAppable" | {{{appable}}} |- | id="AllianceMembers" | '''Alliance Member Groups:''' || colspan="3" id="AllianceMembers" | {{#ask: [[Category:Groups]] [[Groupalliance::{{PAGENAME}}]] | default=None}} |- | colspan="4" id="AllianceDescription" | {{{description}}} |} [[Category:Alliances]] [[Category:Information Files]] {{#set:Information=Alliances}} 
{{Alliance
| allianceimage = image.ext
| leaders       = Emperor Leadertype
| role          = What role does this alliance have in the grande scheme of it all?
| alignment     = What Force does it fall under?
| appable       = Yes
| description   = Describe the alliance.
}}

This is the "Character Infobox" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Character Infobox
|firstname=
|lastname=
|middlename=
|image=
|imageoptions=
|caption=
|age=
|species=
|sex=
|height=
|weight=
|series=
|styles=
|hometown=
|group=
|occupation=
|alignment=
|themesong=
|quote=
|footer=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#css: .CharacterBox {width: 300px; font-size: 90%; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; background-color: #f9f9f9; color: black; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-left: 1em; padding: 0.2em; float: right; clear: right; text-align:left; border-radius: 5px; border-spacing:1px;} .CharacterBox td,th { padding:0px 0px 0px 5px;} .CharacterBox th:nth-child(1) { width:100px; } .CharacterBox tr:nth-child(2n+1) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2)} .CharacterBox tr:nth-child(2n+2) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3)} .CharacterBox tr:nth-last-child(1) td {border-radius:0px 0px 5px 5px;} td#image {padding:0px; margin-left: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;} }}{| class="CharacterBox" ! style="text-align: center; background-color:#ccccff; border-radius: 5px 5px 0px 0px;" colspan="2" width="100%" |{{#if:{{{firstname|}}}|'''{{{firstname}}} {{#if:{{{middlename|}}} |''{{{middlename|}}}'' |}}{{{lastname|}}}'''|{{PAGENAME}} }} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}}| {{!}} id="image" colspan="2" {{!}}
[[File:{{{image|}}}|{{{imageoptions|300px}}}]]

Sex | [[Sex::{{{sex|Undefined}}}]] |- ! Height | {{{height|Undefined}}} |- ! Weight | {{{weight|Undefined}}} |- | colspan="2" style="text-align:center;" bgcolor="9e9e9e" | '''Background''' |- ! Group | {{#arraymap:{{#ifeq:{{{group|Unaffiliated}}}|None|Unaffiliated|{{{group|Unaffiliated}}}}}|,|x|[[group::x]]}} |- ! border-top-right-radius:5px;} .LogTable tr td:nth-child(1) {width: 20rem;} .LogTable tr td:nth-child(2) {width: 15rem;} .LogTable tr:nth-child(1) td:nth-child(1) {border-top-left-radius:5px; } .LogTable tr:nth-child(1) td:nth-child(3) {border-top-right-radius:5px; } .LogTable tr:nth-child(2n+1) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.4)} .LogTable tr:nth-child(2n) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2)} .LogTable td { vertical-align:top; padding: 0px 0px 0px 5px;} .logTable tr:nth-last-child(1) {border-bottom-right-radius: 5px; border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;} .LogTable tr:nth-last-child(1) td:nth-child(1) {border-bottom-left-radius:5px;} .LogTable tr:nth-last-child(1) td:nth-last-child(1) {border-bottom-right-radius:5px;} .LogTable tr td:nth-child(odd) { word-wrap:break-word; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; max-height:1.5em; height:1.5em; display:block;} .HeaderCell {padding: 0px 0px 0px 5px;} .HeaderCell:nth-child(1) {border-radius:5px 0px 0px 0px; width: 35%;} .HeaderCell:nth-child(2) {width: 10rem;} .HeaderCell:nth-child(3) {border-radius:0px 5px 0px 0px; width: 65%;} .LogRow { max-height:1em;} .LogRow:nth-child(1) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.5)} .LogRow:nth-child(2n+2) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2)} .LogRow:nth-child(2n+3) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3)} .LogCell { vertical-align:top; padding: 0px 0px 0px 5px; max-height:1em;} .LogRow:last-of-type td:nth-last-child(3) {border-radius:0px 0px 0px 5px} .LogRow:last-of-type td:nth-last-child(1) {border-radius:0px 0px 5px 0px;} .LogCell:nth-child(odd) { word-wrap:break-word; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; max-height:1.5em; height:1.5em; display:block;} }} {| class="LogTable" ! class=HeaderCell | Title ! class=HeaderCell | Date ! class=HeaderCell | Scene Summary |- class="LogRow" {{#ask:[[Category:{{{1|Roleplay Logs}}}]] [[Log Characters::{{{2|{{#var:charid}}}}}]] |?Log Date |?Log Synopsis |format=template |template=Log List Single |limit=99999 |sort=Log Date |order=descending |link=none |default={{!}} colspan=3 {{!}} No logs submitted yet. }} |} To include character logs: 
{{Character Logs}}
For Cutscenes: 
{{Character Logs|Cutscenes}}
For a specific character: 
{{Character Logs||Char_id}}
{{Character Logs|Cutscenes|Char_id}}

This is the "RP Log Template" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Cutscene Header
| Synopsis           = What was the scene about? 
| TinyPlot           = In the case there is a Tinyplot page you wish to associate with this log.
| Cast of Characters = Characters who were in the scene, seperated by commas.
| Thanks             = In case you wish to thank People who NPCed... etc - Optional
| Location           = Where did it ICly take place?
| Date of Scene      = When did this OOCly take place?
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#css: .LogHeader { width:60%; border-radius:5px; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto;} .LogTitle {text-align:center; font-size:medium; color: white; text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px black; border-radius: 5px 5px 0px 0px; background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.5)} .LogRow {text-align:left;} .LogRow:nth-child(2n+2) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2)} .LogRow:nth-child(2n+3) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3)} .LogCell {padding:0px 0px 0px 4px; vertical-align:top;} .LogCell:nth-child(1) {Width:140px;} .LogCell:nth-child(2) {font-weight:normal;} .LastCell:nth-child(1) {border-radius: 0px 0px 0px 5px} .LastCell:nth-child(2) {border-radius: 0px 0px 5px 0px} }}{| class="LogHeader" |- class="LogRow" ! class="LogTitle" colspan="2"| {{PAGENAME}} |- class="LogRow" ! class="LogCell" | Date of Cutscene: || class="LogCell" | {{#set:Log Date={{{Date of Scene}}}}}{{#time: d F Y | {{{Date of Scene}}} }} |- class="LogRow" ! class="LogCell" | Location: || class="LogCell" | {{#arraymap:{{{Location|}}}|,|x|{{#set:Log Location=x}}[[x]]}} |- class="LogRow" ! class="LogCell" | Synopsis: || class="LogCell" | {{#set:Log Synopsis={{{Synopsis}}}}}{{{Synopsis|}}} {{#if: {{{Thanks|}}} | {{!}}- class="LogRow" ! class="LogCell" {{!}} Thanks to: {{!!}} class="LogCell" {{!}} {{{Thanks}}} | }} |- class="LogRow" ! class="LogCell" | Cast of Characters: || class="LogCell" | {{#arraymap:{{{Cast of Characters}}}|,|x|{{#set:Log Characters=x}}{{#if: {{#vardefineecho: x | {{#ask: [[Char_id::x]]}}}} | {{#var: x}} | x}}|, }} {{#if: {{{Tinyplot|}}} | {{!}}- class="LogRow" ! class="LogCell LastCell" {{!}} Tinyplot: {{!!}} class="LogCell LastCell" {{!}} [[Log Tinyplot::{{{Tinyplot}}}]] | }} |} [[Category:Cutscenes]] ----

{{#css: .GroupTable {width:100%; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; background-color: #f9f9f9; text-align:left; border-radius: 10px; vertical-align:top; border-spacing:0px;} .GroupTable th:nth-child(1) {width:10%; padding: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-radius: 10px 10px 0px 0px} .GroupTable td:nth-child(1) {width:8rem; padding: 0px 0px 0px 10px;} .GroupTable tr:nth-child(1) {text-shadow:1px 1px 1px gray; background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.5);} .GroupTable tr:nth-child(1) th { padding: 5px; font-family: serif; font-size:72px; height:135px; word-wrap:break-word; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden;} .GroupTable td:nth-child(odd) {font-weight:700;} #GroupLeader {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px;} #GroupLeader th {border: 0px; border-radius: 10px 10px 0px 0px} #GroupRole {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px;} #GroupAlignment {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3); border: 0px;} #GroupAppable {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3); border: 0px;} #GroupAlliances {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px;} #GroupMembers {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3); border: 0px;} #GroupDescription {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px; font-weight:normal; border-radius:0px 0px 10px 10px;} }}{| class="GroupTable" ! colspan="4" | {{#if:{{{groupimage|}}} | [[File:{{{groupimage}}}|135x135px]] {{PAGENAME}}| {{PAGENAME}} }} |- | id="GroupLeader" | Leader: || id="GroupLeader" | {{#arraymap:{{{leader|}}}|,|x|{{#set:Groupleader=x}}[[x]]}} | id="GroupRole" | Role: || id="GroupRole" | {{{role}}} |- | id="GroupAlignment" | Average Alignment: || id="GroupAlignment" | {{#set:Groupalignment={{{alignment|Undefined}}}}}[[{{{alignment}}}]] | id="GroupAppable" | Appable: || id="GroupAppable" | {{{appable}}} |- | id="GroupAlliances" | Alliances: || id="GroupAlliances" colspan=3 | {{#arraymap:{{{alliances|}}}|,|x|{{#set:Groupalliance=x}}[[x]]}} |- | id="GroupMembers" | '''Group Members:''' || colspan="3" id="GroupMembers" | {{Group Members}} |- | colspan="4" id="GroupDescription" | {{{description}}} |} [[Category:Groups]] [[Category:Information Files]] {{#set:Information=Groups}} 
{{Group
| groupimage   = image.ext
| leader       = Emperor Leadertype
| role         = What role does this group have in the grande scheme of it all?
| alignment    = What Force does it fall under?
| alliances    = What alliances does this group have?
| appable      = Yes
| description  = Describe the group.
}}

<includeonly>{{#ask: [[Category:Characters]] [[group::{{PAGENAME}}]]
|format=list
}}</includeonly>

{{#css: .LocationTable {width:100%; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; background-color: #f9f9f9; text-align:left; border-radius: 10px; vertical-align:top; border-spacing:0px;} .LocationTable th:nth-child(1) {width:10%; padding: 0px 0px 0px 10px; border-radius: 10px 10px 0px 0px} .LocationTable td:nth-child(1) {width:10%; padding: 0px 0px 0px 10px;} .LocationTable tr:nth-child(1) {text-shadow:1px 1px 1px gray; background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.5);} .LocationTable tr:nth-child(1) th { padding: 5px; font-family: serif; font-size:72px; word-wrap:break-word; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden;} .LocationTable td:nth-child(odd) {font-weight:700;} #LocationAlignment {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px;} #LocationGroup {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2); border: 0px;} #LocationDescription {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3); border: 0px; font-weight:normal; border-radius:0px 0px 10px 10px;} }}{| class="LocationTable" ! colspan="4" align="Center"| {{#if:{{{locationimage|}}} | [[File:{{{locationimage}}}|400x400px]]| {{PAGENAME}} }} |- | id="LocationAlignment" | Average Alignment: || id="LocationAlignment" | {{#set:Locationalignment={{{alignment|Undefined}}}}}[[{{{alignment}}}]] | id="LocationGroup" | Associated Groups: || id="LocationGroup" | {{#arraymap:{{{groups|}}}|,|x|[[x]]}} |- | colspan="4" id="LocationDescription" | {{{description}}} |} [[Category:Locations]] [[Category:Information Files]] {{#set:Information=Locations}} 
{{Location
| locationimage = image.ext
| alignment     = What Force does it fall under?
| groups        = Groups, delimited by commas, that are assiated with this location.
| description   = Describe the Location.
}}

This is the "RP Log Template" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Log Dossier
| Synopsis           = What was the scene about? 
| Tinyplot           = In the case there is a Tinyplot page you wish to associate with this log.
| Tinyplot2          = If there's a second TP the scene was part of.
| Cast of Characters = Characters who were in the scene, seperated by commas.
| Thanks             = In case you wish to thank People who NPCed... etc - Optional
| Location           = Where did it ICly take place?
| Date of Scene      = When did this OOCly take place?
| pretty             = If you have your log formatted according to the guidelines, use 'yes' to get it to look 'pretty' 
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. __NOCACHE__ {{#css: .LogHeader { width:60%; border-radius:5px; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto;} .LogTitle {text-align:center; font-size:medium; color: white; text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px black; border-radius: 5px 5px 0px 0px; background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.5)} .LogRow {text-align:left;} .LogRow:nth-child(2n+2) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.2)} .LogRow:nth-child(2n+3) {background-color: rgba(0,70,70,.3)} .LogCell {padding:0px 0px 0px 4px; vertical-align:top;} .LogCell:nth-child(1) {Width:140px;} .LogCell:nth-child(2) {font-weight:normal;} .LastCell:nth-child(1) {border-radius: 0px 0px 0px 5px} .LastCell:nth-child(2) {border-radius: 0px 0px 5px 0px} }}{{#css: { /* white-space: pre; */ font-family: Fixed, monospace; font-size: 10pt; color: #BBBBBB; background-color: inherit; } .flash { text-decoration:blink; } .underline {text-decoration:underline; } .bg_x { background-color: #000000; border-radius:5px; padding:5px;} dl:nth-child(2n+2) dd {background-color:rgba(0,70,70,.4); border-radius:5px; padding:5px;} | }} }} ----

{| class="LogTable" {{#ask:[[Category:{{{1|Roleplay Logs}}}]] [[Log Characters::{{{2|{{{Char_id|PAGENAME}}}}}}]] |?Log Date |?Log Synopsis |format=template |template=Log List Single |sort=Log Date |link=none |order=descending |default=No logs submitted yet. }} |}

<includeonly>
{{#vardefine:bluh|{{#if:{{#titleparts:{{{1}}}|0|2}}|{{#titleparts:{{{1}}}|0|2}}|{{{1}}}}}}}
| class="LogCell" | [[{{{1}}}|{{#var:bluh}}]] || class="LogCell" | {{#time:F|{{{2}}}}} {{Ordinal Date|{{#time:j|{{{2}}}}}}}, {{#time:Y|{{{2}}}}} || class="LogCell" | {{{3}}}
|- class="LogRow"
</includeonly>

= {{#switch:{{{1|1}}}|1=January|2=Febuary|3=March|4=April|5=May|6=June|7=July|8=August|9=September|10=October|11=November|12=December|January}} {{{2|2013}}} = {| class="LogTable" |- class="LogRow" ! class=HeaderCell | Title ! class=HeaderCell | Date ! class=HeaderCell | Scene Summary |- class="LogRow" {{#ask:[[Category:Roleplay Logs]] [[Log Date::≥{{{1|1}}}-01-{{{2|2013}}}]] [[Log Date::<<{{#expr:{{{3|{{{1|1}}}+1}}}}}-01-{{{4|{{{2|2013}}}}}}]] |?Log Date |?Log Synopsis |format=template |template=Log List Single |sort=Log Date |link=none |order=descending |default={{!}} colspan=3 {{!}} No logs submitted yet. |limit=200 }} |}

This is the "Poses" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Poses
|Poses=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{{Poses|}}}

{{#css: .RelationTable {width:100%;} .RelationTable td:nth-child(1) {width: 15%} .RelationTable td:nth-child(2) {width: 10%} .RelationTable td:nth-child(3) {width: 75%} .RelationTable tr:last-of-type td:nth-last-child(1) {border-radius:0px 0px 5px 0px;} .RelationTable tr:last-of-type td:nth-last-child(3) {border-radius:0px 0px 0px 5px;} .RelationTable tr:nth-child(n+1) td:nth-child(2) {font-style:italic;} }}{{CTable}} Sets the CSS for a RelationTable. Should be called along with {{CTable}} 
{| class="CTable RelationTable"
|-
! scope="col"  | Name
! scope="col"  | Short
! scope="col"  | Thoughts
|-
| [[Person]]
| "Snippet"
| Words words words
|-
| [[Person 2]]
| "Snippet"
| Words words words words.
|}
{| class="CTable RelationTable" |- ! scope="col" | Name ! scope="col" | Short ! scope="col" | Thoughts |- | [[Person]] | "Snippet" | Words words words |- | [[Person 2]] | "Snippet" | Words words words words. |}

This is the "Single Pose" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Single Pose
|Poser=
|Pose=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. :'''[[Log Characters::{{{Poser|}}}]] has posed:'''
{{{Pose|}}}

{{{for template|Log Header|label=Roleplaying Log}}} {| class="formtable" ! Date of Scene: | {{{field|Date of Scene|mandatory|property=Log Date}}} |- ! Location: | {{{field|Location|mandatory|property=Log Location|placeholder=Where did this scene play out?|size=118px}}} |- ! Synopsis: | {{{field|Synopsis|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=Log Synopsis|placeholder=What was this scene about? Give a general description.|autogrow|size=118px}}} |- ! Thanks: | {{{field|Thanks|placeholder=To thank a GM etc. (Optional)|size=118px}}} |- ! Cast of Characters: | {{{field|Cast of Characters|input type=text with autocomplete|mandatory|property=Log Characters|placeholder=A comma seperated list of the scene's Cast.|values from property=Log Characters|values from category=Characters|list|delimiter=,|size=118px}}} |- ! Tinyplot: | {{{field|Tinyplot|property=Log Tinyplot|placeholder=Note the Tinyplot's name, if it was part of one. (Optional)|values from category=Tinyplot|size=118px}}} |- ! Markup: | {{{field|pretty|placeholder=If you kept up with the Log Guidelines or are using the SceneSys page for Wiki-Logs, insert 'yes'. (Optional)|size=118px}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Single Pose|multiple|label=The Poses}}} '''Poser:''' {{{field|Poser}}} '''Pose:''' {{{field|Pose|input type=textarea}}} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}} [[Category:Forms]]

revision.comment: Created page with "THIS PAGE IS UNDEAD WHY WILL IT NOT GO AWAY??? [[Category:Undead]]"
revision.text:
THIS PAGE IS UNDEAD WHY WILL IT NOT GO AWAY???
[[Category:Undead]]

{{{for template|CharacterNew|label=Character Page}}} {| class="formtable" ! @Name On MUSH: | {{{field|NameOnMUSH|property=NameOnMUSH|mandatory|size=90}}} |- ! Character ID (Use +charid; if it doesn't work, +scene/setup, and try again!) | {{{field|Char_id|mandatory|property=Char_id|textarea|placeholder=If the character predates Char IDs, put -1.|rows=1}}} |- ! Image URL | {{{field|Img|placeholder=Optional|size=90}}} |- ! Full Name: | {{{field|FullName|mandatory|size=90}}} |- ! Gender: | {{{field|Gender|mandatory|size=90}}} |- ! Species: | {{{field|Species|mandatory|size=90}}} |- ! Theme/Series/Source: | {{{field|Theme|mandatory|size=90}}} |- ! Chartype: | {{{field|Chartype|mandatory|input type=combobox|size=90|values=FC, OC, OFC, FOC, NPC, TP|existing values only|default=FC}}} |- ! Function: | {{{field|Function|mandatory|size=90}}} |- ! Faction: | {{{field|Faction|mandatory|input type=combobox|size=90|values=Union, Confederacy, Syndicate, Unaffiliated|existing values only|default=Union}}} |- ! Rank: | {{{field|Rank|mandatory|placeholder=#-Title|size=90}}} |- ! Rank Type: | {{{field|Ranktype|mandatory|input type=combobox|size=90|values=Ally, Enlisted, Last Chancer, Last Chancer XO, Fachead, Unaffiliated, Syndicate|existing values only|default=Ally}}} |- ! Groups: | {{{field|Groups|placeholder=Groups you are in. Put in brackets to link.|size=90}}} |- ! Quote: | {{{field|Quote|mandatory|placeholder=From your +finger.|size=90}}} |- ! Physical Age: | {{{field|PAge|placeholder=What your character looks like.|size=90}}} |- ! Actual Age: | {{{field|AAge|placeholder=His or her actual age.|size=90}}} |- ! Still Aging?: | {{{field|Aging|placeholder=Is your character getting older?|size=90}}} |- ! Height: | {{{field|Height|size=90}}} |- ! Weight: | {{{field|Weight|size=90}}} |- ! Hair Color: | {{{field|Hair|size=90}}} |- ! Eye Color: | {{{field|Eyes|size=90}}} |- ! Voice Actor: | {{{field|Voice|size=90}}} |- ! Themesong: | {{{field|Song|placeholder=Title or Youtube links!|size=90}}} |- ! Profile: | {{{field|Profile|mandatory|placeholder=Your +finger profile.|property=TextField}}} |- ! Powers: | {{{field|Powers|placeholder=Your +adv/powers.|property=TextField}}} |- ! Skills: | {{{field|Skills|placeholder=Your +adv/skills.|property=TextField}}} |- ! Assets: | {{{field|Assets|placeholder=Your +adv/assets.|property=TextField}}} |- ! NPCs: | {{{field|NPCs|placeholder=Your +adv/npcs.|property=TextField}}} |- ! Disadvantages: | {{{field|Disadvantages|mandatory|placeholder=Your +flaws.|property=TextField}}} |- |} {{{end template}}} THIS FINAL FIELD WILL CONTAIN A COPY OF YOUR ENTIRE CHARACTER PAGE IF IT'S A CONVERSION JOB AND NOT A NEW PAGE! PLEASE DO NOT IGNORE IT AND PROPERLY CLEAN IT UP! '''Other Sections! Whatever You Want!:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "Cutscene" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Cutscene}}
{{{for template|Cutscene Header|label=Cutscene}}} {| class="formtable" ! Date of Scene: | {{{field|Date of Scene}}} |- ! Location: | {{{field|Location}}} |- ! Synopsis: | {{{field|Synopsis|input type=textarea}}} |- ! Thanks: | {{{field|Thanks}}} |- ! Cast of Characters (Char/Scene IDs, Not Names!): | {{{field|Cast of Characters|input type=textarea with autocomplete|autogrow|values from category=Characters|list}}} |- ! Tinyplot: | {{{field|Tinyplot}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "Roleplaying Log" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Roleplaying Log}}
{{{for template|Log Header|label=Roleplaying Log}}} {| class="formtable" ! Date of Scene: | {{{field|Date of Scene|mandatory|property=Log Date}}} |- ! Location: | {{{field|Location|mandatory|property=Log Location|placeholder=Where did this scene play out?|size=118px}}} |- ! Synopsis: | {{{field|Synopsis|input type=textarea|mandatory|property=Log Synopsis|placeholder=What was this scene about? Give a general description.|autogrow|size=118px}}} |- ! Thanks: | {{{field|Thanks|placeholder=To thank a GM etc. (Optional)|size=118px}}} |- ! Cast of Characters (DON'T DELETE OR REMOVE NUMBERS, THEY ARE NEEDED): | {{{field|Cast of Characters|input type=text with autocomplete|mandatory|property=Log Characters|placeholder=A comma seperated list of the scene's Cast.|values from property=Log Characters|values from category=Characters|list|delimiter=,|size=118px}}} |- ! Tinyplot: | {{{field|Tinyplot|property=Log Tinyplot|placeholder=Note the Tinyplot's name, if it was part of one. (Optional)|values from category=Tinyplot|size=118px}}} |- ! Tinyplot2: | {{{field|Tinyplot2|property=Tinyplot Two|placeholder=Note the Tinyplot's name, if it was part of a second one. (Optional)|values from category=Tinyplot|size=118px}}} |- ! Markup: | {{{field|pretty|placeholder=If you kept up with the Log Guidelines or are using the SceneSys page for Wiki-Logs, insert 'yes'. (Optional)|size=118px}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Poses|label=The Log}}} {| class="formtable" !(See [[Log Guidelines|the log guidelines]] in case you want to see your log Marked up, or are using the output of the WIKI version of the SceneSys page.) |- | {{{field|Poses|input type=textarea|rows=10}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}} [[Category:Form]]
